snippet.title: Black Sheep TGS2021 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Available in 2022 on Steam
Black Sheep is a 2D psychological horror puzzle adventure game. In a small town after a flood, you will play a high school student exploring in the ruins of the school to find out the dark secret buried deep.
